gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 133, Hornets 121
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nets defeated the Hornets, 133-121. Cam Thomas led all scorers with 33 points, two rebounds, and two assists for the Nets, while Mikal Bridges added 24 points, seven rebounds and four assists in the victory. Terry Rozier tallied 23 points, nine assists, and three rebounds for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Nets improve to 1-2, while the Hornets fall to 1-2.
